body: <%= tabs('${1}', [{name: '${2}', label: t('${3}'), icon: '${4}', renderizar: ${5}}], classe='justify-content-start') %>
<%= modal(name:'${1}', renderizar:'${2}', btnstr: t('${3}'), icon: '${4}', title: '${5}')%>
<%= render 'util/criteria', path: '${1}', criteria: [{ field: '${2}', type: ${3:string}, label: t('${4}')}] %>
